Question: During the ____ic Wars he was taken seriously by the British press as a dangerous tyrant, poised to invade.
Hints: This person spent the last six years of his life in confinement by the British on the island of Saint Helena.
This person was teased by other students for his accent and applied himself to reading.
The couple had one child, this person Francis Joseph Charles (1811–1832), known from birth as the King of Rome.
